Find in store Product details CeraVe Blemish Control Gel Moisturiser with 2% Salicylic Acid & Niacinamide for Blemish-Prone Skin 40mlFacial moisturiser for blemish-prone skin, which targets blemishes & blackheads, helping skin look noticeably clearer. The formula penetrates pores to eliminate the cause of spots & blemishes, while protecting the skin’s natural barrier.Developed with dermatologists:All CeraVe products have been developed with Dermatologists.Specifically formulated for blemish-prone skin:Take control of your skin, with CeraVe Blemish Control range. This gentle exfoliating yet hydrating moisturiser formula is proven to improve skin texture & tone and reduce the appearance of pores.Active Ingredients:This formula contains 3 Essential Ceramides and a powerful exfoliating blend of alpha and beta-hydroxy acids (AHA and BHA) including Glycolic Acid, Lactic Acid & 2% Salicylic Acid. Also contains Niacinamide, Glycerin and Hyaluronic Acid.Key benefits:Facial moisturiser for blemish-prone skin. For all over application, or targeted useTargets blemishes & blackheads, helping skin look noticeably clearerProven to improve skin texture and reduce poresMaintains healthy-looking skin with daily useLightweight, fast-absorbing formulaHydrates skin for up to 24 hoursNon-greasy & non-drying formulaNumber of blackheads appear reduced by up to 45%*Number of spots appear reduced by up to 33%***Clinical study, 4 weeks, 52 subjects**Clinical study, 8 weeks, 52 subjects. Suitable for Blemish-Prone & Combination Skin How to use Cleanse the skin thoroughly before applying this product, we recommend using CeraVe Blemish Control Cleanser. Recommended for evening use.Use applicator to dispense product onto fingers. Apply all over face for general application or use as a targeted treatment on affected areas.Apply CeraVe Blemish Control Gel in the evening and always follow with SPF protection in the day time – we suggest the CeraVe AM Facial Moisturising Lotion SPF 50.To prevent from over-drying the skin, start with one application every couple of days and then build up to daily usage or twice a day. If dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.DISCOVER CERAVE’S EVERYDAY ROUTINE FOR BLEMISH-PRONE SKIN:Step 1: Cleanse the skin thoroughly using CeraVe Blemish Control Cleanser. Recommended use day and night.Step 2 [AM]: In the morning, follow with CeraVe AM Facial Moisturising Lotion SPF 50Step 2 [PM]: In the evening, apply Cerave Blemish Control Gel Facial Moisturiser. Use the applicator to dispense product onto fingers. Apply all over face for general application or use as a targeted treatment on affected areas.To help reduce the appearance of discolouration and post-acne marks, swap out the Blemish Control Gel for CeraVe Retinol Resurfacing Serum. Recommended use in the evening only & always follow with SPF 50 protection in the daytime. Hazards and Cautions In case of contact with the eyes, rinse immediately and thoroughly Important info Country of Origin: FranceAddress: CeraVe, 62, Quai Charles Pasqua – 92300 LEVALLOIS-PERRET France L'Oreal UK & Ireland Ltd, Gateway Central 187 Wood Lane, London W12 7SA, Cerave@uk.oaccare.com Ingredients INGREDIENTS: AQUA/WATER, GLYCERIN, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, GLYCOLIC ACID, LACTIC ACID, SALICYLIC ACID, NIACINAMIDE, CERAMIDE NP, CERAMIDE AP, CERAMIDE EOP, CARBOMER, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, BEHENTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE, TRIETHYL CITRATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM LAUROYL LACTYLATE, CHOLESTEROL, CHLORPHENESIN, DISODIUM EDTA, HYDROXYPROPYL GUAR, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, XANTHAN GUM, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, BENZOIC ACID (CODE F.I.L. Find in store Product details This non-drying, lightly foaming cleanser removes makeup and dirt, while helping to reduce blackheads and breakouts. As well as effectively cleansing the skin, this 2% Salicylic Acid cleanser has an added zinc compound. Together they help with oil-control, reducing blackheads and breakouts and promoting a more even looking complexion. KEY INGREDIENTS: • 2% Salicylic Acid helps to unclog pores and gently exfoliate • Zinc compound helps reduce excess oil • 0.5% Allantoin helps soothe irritation How to use Salicylic Acid Cleanser can be used in the AM and PM. Gently massage a small amount onto dampened face and neck for at least 60 seconds. Rinse thoroughly with water and follow with the rest of your skincare recipe. Hazards and Cautions External use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse well with water. Keep out of reach of children. product_name: CeraVe Skin Renewing Eye Cream with Peptide Complex & Caffeine for Brighter, Smoother Eyes 15ml - Boots
brand: CeraVe Skin Renewing Eye Cream with Peptide Complex & Caffeine for Brighter, Smoother Eyes 15ml
ingredients: Cerave CeraVe Skin Renewing Eye Cream is a daily lightweight eye cream with an anti-ageing peptide complex, that’s formulated to target the first signs of ageing to reveal a visibly brighter, firmer eye area and reduce the look of fine lines & wrinkles. Developed with dermatologists, this eye cream reveals a more plump, youthful-looking eye area and maintains the skin barrier. ​Skin ageing is natural, however early signs of ageing can be exaggerated by UV exposure, lack of hydration and pollution.This deeply hydrating formula enriched with active ingredients: peptide complex, caffeine, hyaluronic acid, niacinamide & 3 essential ceramides targets the first signs of ageing; fine lines & wrinkles, skin texture, dullness. Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin & eyes.All CeraVe products have been Developed with Dermatologists.​Formula with active ingredients: With a peptide complex & caffeine, skin around the eye appears plumper with fine lines and crow’s feet visibly reduced ​With Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid, moisture is locked at the skin surface for a more radiant, youthful-looking appearance.​Enriched with 3 Essential Ceramides, the skin barrier is maintained.Ceramides make up around 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier.Aging studies show ceramide levels decrease.CeraVe products are formulated with 3 essential ceramides to help restore and maintain the skin barrier. ​Key Benefits:Targets the first signs of ageing: fine lines & wrinkles, skin texture, dullness77% agree wrinkles around the eye area appear reduced*Hydrates skin for up to 24 hours**, supporting soft, radiant and healthier-looking skin.89% agree skin around the eye area looks smoother*Can be used alone or layered under makeup.Suitable for sensitive skin & eyes.​*Self Assessment, 76 subjects**Instrumental test, 25 subjects​Brightening & Smoothing Routine:1. Cleanse to remove dirt & impurities from the skin. We recommend the Hydrating Cleanser for normal to dry skin. Rinse with water & avoid the eye area.2. After cleansing, apply Skin Renewing Vitamin C Serum onto your finger, and apply all over your face. Allow product to fully absorb before layering skincare on top.3. To target the eye area, apply Skin Renewing Eye Cream dots around the eye contour & blend using upwards motions.​4. Follow with a moisturiser & sun protection with a minimum of SPF30. How to use After cleansing, unscrew cap & dispense the Skin Renewing Eye Cream to your finger. product_name: Olay Regenerist Night Face Cream Moisturiser with Anti-ageing Niacinamide and Peptides 50ml - Boots
brand: Olay Regenerist Night Face Cream Moisturiser with Anti
ingredients: Olay Discover Active Firming Skincare with Olay's Regenerist Fragrance Free Night Cream. Nourish and Restore Your Skin Overnight with Olay Regenerist Night Face Cream. Wake up to hydrated, refreshed skin with this night cream, formulated to firm, nourish and restore skin. This cream features our Microsculpting technology with powerful peptides and 99% pure niacinamide, penetrating 10 surface layers deep to accelerate surface skin cell renewal for visible skin regeneration. Key Ingredients: - Anti-ageing Peptides: known to visibly reduce fine lines and wrinkles, - Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): helps activate surface cell renewal, - Glycerin: A hydrating ingredient that helps retain moisture, keeping your skin hydrated and soft. This cream's silky texture absorbs easily, leaving your skin feeling non-greasy and non-sticky. After just one use, skin looks nourished and refreshed. Over time, fine lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced, and skin feels renewed and rejuvenated. For the ultimate anti-aging routine, pair this with Olay Regenerist Day Cream or Olay Regenerist SPF30 Day Cream for added UV protection." Availability is an indication only and is updated every 30 minutes. Find in store Product details Discover Active Firming Skincare with Olay's Regenerist Fragrance Free Night Cream. Nourish and Restore Your Skin Overnight with Olay Regenerist Night Face Cream. Wake up to hydrated, refreshed skin with this night cream, formulated to firm, nourish and restore skin. This cream features our Microsculpting technology with powerful peptides and 99% pure niacinamide, penetrating 10 surface layers deep to accelerate surface skin cell renewal for visible skin regeneration. Key Ingredients: - Anti-ageing Peptides: known to visibly reduce fine lines and wrinkles, - Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): helps activate surface cell renewal, - Glycerin: A hydrating ingredient that helps retain moisture, keeping your skin hydrated and soft. This cream's silky texture absorbs easily, leaving your skin feeling non-greasy and non-sticky. After just one use, skin looks nourished and refreshed. Over time, fine lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced, and skin feels renewed and rejuvenated. For the ultimate anti-aging routine, pair this with Olay Regenerist Day Cream or Olay Regenerist SPF30 Day Cream for added UV protection." How to use Use in the evening. Smooth evenly over cleansed face and neck. Hazards and Cautions Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, rinse with water. product_name: L'Oréal Paris 2.5% Hyaluronic Acid and Caffeine Eye Serum, Revitalift Filler Eye Serum – 20ml - Boots
brand: L'Oréal Paris 2.5% Hyaluronic Acid and Caffeine Eye Serum, Revitalift Filler Eye Serum – 20ml
ingredients: L'Oreal Book a FREE skincare consultation with a L'Oreal Paris skincare expert to find the best skincare products and ingredients for your skin - https://www.boots.com/loreal/loreal-paris-virtual-consultation L'OrÉal Paris 2.5% Hyaluronic Acid and Caffeine Eye Serum, Revitalift Filler Eye Serum - 20ml THE WORLD’S NUMBER 1 SERUM* NOW FOR THE EYES. Introducing Revitalift Filler Eye serum with 2.5% [Hyaluronic acid + Caffeine]. Stress, screen time, lack of sleep and pollution can all take it’s toll on our skin, and the delicate eye area where skin is up to 10x thinner and more sensitive is often the first place to show signs of ageing and fatigue. Revitalift Filler Eye serum with 2.5% [Hyaluronic acid + Caffeine] has been specifically formulated for the unique eye area and is proven to visibly brighten dark circles and replump eye lines for younger looking eyes. The formula is validated by dermatologists, effective on all skin tones and fragrance free. MACRO AND MICRO HYALURONIC ACID With both macro Hyaluronic Acid and a higher concentration of micro Hyaluronic Acid which penetrates deeper into the epidermis the serum intensely hydrates, smooths and replumps eye lines. CAFFEINE AND NIACINIMIDE Formulated with Caffeine and 4% Niacinamide the serum targets dark circles leaving the skin around the eyes looking more radiant, energised, and brighter. COOLING TRIPLE BEAD APPLICATOR The unique cooling triple bead applicator with its 3 stainless steel beads, has been designed to maximise results by providing a gentle massage to the under eye and eye lids, targeting puffiness and refreshing tired eyes. LAYERS WELL UNDER MAKE-UP The Revitalift Filler Eye Serum clear liquid formula is quickly absorbed and is non-greasy or oily layering perfectly under make-up. Use as part of your day and night routine with Revitalift Filler Dropper Serum for visibly hydrated, smooth and younger looking skin. ©2020 Nielsen data, value sales, year to date w/e 11.07.21. Find in store Product details Book a FREE skincare consultation with a L'Oreal Paris skincare expert to find the best skincare products and ingredients for your skin - https://www.boots.com/loreal/loreal-paris-virtual-consultation L'OrÉal Paris 2.5% Hyaluronic Acid and Caffeine Eye Serum, Revitalift Filler Eye Serum - 20ml THE WORLD’S NUMBER 1 SERUM* NOW FOR THE EYES. Introducing Revitalift Filler Eye serum with 2.5% [Hyaluronic acid + Caffeine]. Stress, screen time, lack of sleep and pollution can all take it’s toll on our skin, and the delicate eye area where skin is up to 10x thinner and more sensitive is often the first place to show signs of ageing and fatigue. Revitalift Filler Eye serum with 2.5% [Hyaluronic acid + Caffeine] has been specifically formulated for the unique eye area and is proven to visibly brighten dark circles and replump eye lines for younger looking eyes. The formula is validated by dermatologists, effective on all skin tones and fragrance free. MACRO AND MICRO HYALURONIC ACID With both macro Hyaluronic Acid and a higher concentration of micro Hyaluronic Acid which penetrates deeper into the epidermis the serum intensely hydrates, smooths and replumps eye lines. CAFFEINE AND NIACINIMIDE Formulated with Caffeine and 4% Niacinamide the serum targets dark circles leaving the skin around the eyes looking more radiant, energised, and brighter. COOLING TRIPLE BEAD APPLICATOR The unique cooling triple bead applicator with its 3 stainless steel beads, has been designed to maximise results by providing a gentle massage to the under eye and eye lids, targeting puffiness and refreshing tired eyes. LAYERS WELL UNDER MAKE-UP The Revitalift Filler Eye Serum clear liquid formula is quickly absorbed and is non-greasy or oily layering perfectly under make-up. Use as part of your day and night routine with Revitalift Filler Dropper Serum for visibly hydrated, smooth and younger looking skin. ©2020 Nielsen data, value sales, year to date w/e 11.07.21. For verification https://loreal-paris.co.uk/serumno1 Suitable for Eyes How to use Apply on thoroughly cleansed, dry skin every morning and evening: Massage in small circles from the inner corner of your eye up to your temple, to help smooth the appearance of lines and the coolness helps to de-pu bags. Repeat 4x. Gently smooth over eyelids to lift them up. Finish by applying light pressure on the 6 points as indicated on pack. Hazards and Cautions In case of contact with the eyes, rinse immediately and thoroughly. Important info Country of Origin: GermanyAddress: LOREAL PARIS14, rue Royale - 75008 Paris FRANCE. product_name: Dove Advanced Care Body Wash Pampering Shea Butter & Vanilla 400ml - Boots
brand: Dove Advanced Care Body Wash Pampering Shea Butter & Vanilla 400ml
ingredients: Dove Are you looking for an indulgent Body Wash to bring a little more self-care to your daily routine? Dove Advanced Care Pampering body wash is a rich and creamy moisturising Body Wash that works to deeply nourish as it cleanses. Unlike other shea butter products, Dove Pampering Body Wash has a moisturising formula that contains a unique blend of skin-natural nutrients to give you the Dove care you know and love. Unlike ordinary body washes, Dove Advanced Care is made with 24hour Renewing MicroMoisture. A ground-breaking new technology from Dove that deposits millions of tiny but powerfully moisturising droplets that, instead of getting washed off, absorb deeply and continuously work with your skin's natural renewal process to strengthen your skin's barrier and help retain and boost moisture, even after you shower. With a cosy, irresistible fragrance of shea butter and warm vanilla scent, this moisturising body wash pampers skin with a foamy lather that will indulge your senses and moisturise skin. And it doesn’t stop there - this formula uses a blend of naturally-derived mild cleansers and skin natural nourishers to gently cleanse your skin and nourish your microbiome. It's also free from sulfate SLES, has 94%* biodegradable ingredients and is packaged in 100% recycled plastic bottles**. *94% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water & minerals (OECD test methods 301, 302, 310). **bottle excluding cap and labels This item has been successfully added to your list. x Skip to navigation Skip to content Skip to search Message Dialog Maximum basket size reached Out of stock placeholder... Availability is an indication only and is updated every 30 minutes. Find in store Product details Are you looking for an indulgent Body Wash to bring a little more self-care to your daily routine? Dove Advanced Care Pampering body wash is a rich and creamy moisturising Body Wash that works to deeply nourish as it cleanses. Unlike other shea butter products, Dove Pampering Body Wash has a moisturising formula that contains a unique blend of skin-natural nutrients to give you the Dove care you know and love. Unlike ordinary body washes, Dove Advanced Care is made with 24hour Renewing MicroMoisture. A ground-breaking new technology from Dove that deposits millions of tiny but powerfully moisturising droplets that, instead of getting washed off, absorb deeply and continuously work with your skin's natural renewal process to strengthen your skin's barrier and help retain and boost moisture, even after you shower. With a cosy, irresistible fragrance of shea butter and warm vanilla scent, this moisturising body wash pampers skin with a foamy lather that will indulge your senses and moisturise skin. And it doesn’t stop there - this formula uses a blend of naturally-derived mild cleansers and skin natural nourishers to gently cleanse your skin and nourish your microbiome. It's also free from sulfate SLES, has 94%* biodegradable ingredients and is packaged in 100% recycled plastic bottles**. *94% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water & minerals (OECD test methods 301, 302, 310). **bottle excluding cap and labels Suitable for Suitable for all skin types How to use To fully let go and relax into the pampering moment, squeeze a generous amount of this Dove Advanced Care Pampering body wash into your palms. Spread all over your body and work into a lather. Then allow the luscious shea butter and warm vanilla scent to fill your shower. Rinse away with warm water, to reveal transformed, touchably soft skin. Hazards and Cautions Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs rinse thoroughly with water Important info Country of Origin: GermanyAddress: GB - Unilever Dept ER Wirral CH63 3JW UKIE & NI - Unilever RA; 90; 3011 AN; NL Ingredients Ingredients: Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Parfum, Carbomer, Lauric Acid, Glycol Distearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauroyl Glycinate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Isethionate, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Palmitic Acid, PPG-6, PPG-2 Hydroxyethyl Cocamide, Sodium Gluconate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Caprylic Acid, Hydroxystearic Acid, Hydrogenated Vegetable Glycerides, Citric Acid, Sodium Methyl Lauroyl Taurate, Benzyl Alcohol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 17200, CI 19140. ...read more ...read less Delivery options Click & Collect £1.50 or free if you spend £15 or more from your choice of 1,800 stores. brand: Garnier Micellar Gel Face Wash For Sensitive Skin 200ml
ingredients: Garnier Looking for an effective, gentle and hydrating cleanser? Garnier Micellar Cleansing Gel Wash gently removes make-up, dirt & impurities, revealing healthy-looking skin. Enriched with Micelle Technology: Micelle cleansing agents capture make-up, impurities and dirt like a magnet and lift them away from skin. The gentle formula effectively cleanses, gliding over skin to avoid rubbing or pulling delicate sensitive skin. Fragrance-free formula: Designed for all types of sensitive skin. Like all Garnier products globally, Micellar is officially approved by Cruelty Free International under the Leaping Bunny Programme, the leading organisation working to end animal testing worldwide, and the recognised Cruelty Free Gold Standard. Availability is an indication only and is updated every 30 minutes. Find in store Product details Looking for an effective, gentle and hydrating cleanser? Garnier Micellar Cleansing Gel Wash gently removes make-up, dirt & impurities, revealing healthy-looking skin. Enriched with Micelle Technology: Micelle cleansing agents capture make-up, impurities and dirt like a magnet and lift them away from skin. The gentle formula effectively cleanses, gliding over skin to avoid rubbing or pulling delicate sensitive skin. Fragrance-free formula: Designed for all types of sensitive skin. Like all Garnier products globally, Micellar is officially approved by Cruelty Free International under the Leaping Bunny Programme, the leading organisation working to end animal testing worldwide, and the recognised Cruelty Free Gold Standard. Suitable for All Skin Types, even sensitive skin How to use Apply to a wet face. Foam up with water and massage gently in circular motions on face focusing on lip and eye area. Rinse off. In case of direct eye contact, rinse immediately. Hazards and Cautions In case of direct eye contact, rinse immediately. product_name: Estée Lauder Daywear Multi-Protection Anti-Oxidant 24H Moisturiser Crème Normal/Combination Skin SPF 15 50ml - Boots
brand: Estée Lauder Daywear Multi
ingredients: Estee Lauder Estèe Lauder DayWear Anti-Oxidant 24H Cream Moisturiser SPF 15 - Normal/Combination SkinA high-performance cream moisturiser that defends skin against signs of premature aging and diminishes the appearance of aging.This hydrating moisturiser with broad spectrum SPF 15 sunscreen infuses skin with an intense surge of moisture for 24 hours. It includes the brand's proven Super Anti-Oxidant Complex and broad-spectrum sunscreen in a light and airy formula, and it reduces the first signs of aging, such as dullness, dryness, loss of radiance and fine, dry lines. Massage this smooth, whipped texture into your skin for an instant burst of hydration - leaving your skin radiant and refreshed, with added SPF protection.Benefits:Original whipped cream moisturiser keeps skin glowing.Special Properties:Contains Estèe Lauder’s Super Antioxidant Complex.Target's pollution and free radical damage.Helps prevent and diminish the look of early ageing.Contains Vitamin C & E, Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, Glycerin, Guava extract and Grape seed extract.24-hour hydration.SPF 15 combats UVA and UVB rays.Suitable best for normal/combination skin and ideal for:Antioxidant protection.Visible age prevention.Dryness & dehydration.Fine, dry lines.Formula facts:Dermatologist-tested and non-comedogenic (won’t clog pores) This item has been successfully added to your list. x Skip to navigation Skip to content Skip to search Message Dialog Maximum basket size reached Out of stock placeholder... It includes the brand's proven Super Anti-Oxidant Complex and broad-spectrum sunscreen in a light and airy formula, and it reduces the first signs of aging, such as dullness, dryness, loss of radiance and fine, dry lines. How to use Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use.Patient Information Leaflets are updated periodically by the manufacturer.Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use. Check the tub seal is not broken before first use. If it is, do not use the cream. Adults and children: Apply to the skin when you need to. For use on the skin only. If symptoms do not go away talk to your doctor. Caution: This preparation may make skin and surfaces slippery particularly when having a bath or shower. If anyone accidentally swallows some of the cream: Talk to a pharmacist or doctor. Hazards and Cautions Before you use this medicine Do not use: • if you are allergic to any of the ingredients. You can use this medicine if you are pregnant or breastfeeding. Important information about some of the ingredients This medicine contains sodium lauryl sulfate which may cause local skin reactions (such as stinging or burning sensation) or increase skin reactions caused by other products when applied on the same area. This medicine contains cetostearyl alcohol which may cause local skin reactions (e.g. contact dermatitis). This medicine contains chlorocresol which may cause allergic reactions. Fire hazard. Do not smoke or go near naked flames; clothing & bedding with this product dried on them can catch fire easily. ! Do not smoke or go near naked ﬂames - risk of severe burns. Fabric (clothing, bedding, dressings etc) that has been in contact with this product burns more easily and is a serious ﬁre hazard. Washing clothing and bedding may reduce product build-up but not totally remove it. If you need more advice, ask your pharmacist. Possible side effects Most people will not have problems, but some may get some of these: • Occasional allergic reactions (e.g. stinging, burning, itching and redness) Reporting of side effects If you get any side effects, talk to your doctor, pharmacist, or nurse. This includes any possible side effects not listed on this label. You can also report side effects directly via the Yellow Card Scheme at: www.mhra.gov.uk/yellowcard or search for MHRA Yellow Card in the Google Play or Apple App Store. By reporting side effects, you can help provide more information on the safety of this medicine. Storage Store in a cool place. Keep all medicines out of the sight and reach of children. Use by the date on the base or side of tub. Precautions This is a medicine; • Consult your doctor or pharmacist if you have an underlying medical condition, are taking any other medication or complementary therapy, or if symptoms persist • Seek advice if you suffer from allergies Active ingredients Liquid Paraffin, White Soft Paraffin Ingredients Active Ingredients: This cream contains Liquid Paraffin 6% w/w, White Soft Paraffin 15% w/w.Also contains: purified water, emulsifying wax (containing cetostearyl alcohol, sodium lauryl sulfate), chlorocresol 0.1% w/w.If you need more advice ask your pharmacist. ...read more ...read less Attachments pdf Patient Information Leaflet Delivery options Click & Collect £1.50 or free if you spend £15 or more from your choice of 1,800 stores. Standard Delivery £3.95 or free when you spend £25 or more. Next Day Delivery Order by 10pm (subject to change during promotions), available 7 days a week for £4.95. This may not be available during public holidays or weekends in between public holidays. To be eligible for Next Day Delivery, Pharmacy Medicines must be ordered by 8pm. Airport Click & Collect £4.50 - Select a delivery date 3 days before your flight. Named Day Delivery £4.75 - choose a weekday within the next 14 days for delivery. Find in store Product details Your go-to ingredient for skin renewal.Derived from Vitamin A, Retinol is the gold standard for skin renewal, helping to target the signs of ageing. Released slowly, this serum helps target the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with less risk of irritation. It also boosts overall skin clarity and uneven skin tone for a brighter, more even complexion.KEY INGREDIENTS: • 1% Retinol Acetate • 0.5% Granactive Retinoid• Squalane for hydration and soothing How to use Only use Retinol in the PM. On cleansed skin, and after Hyaluronic Acid if you are using it, apply a pea-sized amount and massage into to the face and neck. Follow with moisturizer, oil or both depending on preference. Start off using it 1-3 times per week and increase gradually if your skin can tolerate more frequent use. Hazards and Cautions We do not recommend this product if pregnant or breastfeeding, consult your doctor before use. Why We Love: Rich formula is infused with hyaluronic acid and peptides for ultimate hydration Helps minimize dark circles leaving your eyes looking refreshed Non-greasy and fast-absorbing formula Ideal for wearing under makeup to lock in moisture Perfect for all skin types Key Ingredients: Hyaluronic acid - helps hydrate and plump the skin. Peptides - For a more refreshed complexion. Hydrate the eye area and minimize dark circles with this rich formula that nourishes and deeply hydrates the skin. All e.l.f. products are free from phthalates, parabens, nonylphenol ethoxylates, triclosan, triclocarban, and hydroquinone. All skincare is also free from sulfates. product_name: Dove Advanced Care Body Wash Deeply Nourishing Skin Natural Nourishers 400ml - Boots
brand: Dove Advanced Care Body Wash Deeply Nourishing Skin Natural Nourishers 400ml
ingredients: Dove Just as everyone's skin is different, skin dryness can appear differently for everyone. From mild, occasionally dry skin driven by ageing, weather fluctuations or just life! To dry patches and skin dryness, Dove has got you covered. Dove Advanced Care Deeply Nourishing body wash transforms even the driest skin in just one shower leaving it feeling lotion-soft skin for 24hrs. Unlike ordinary body washes, Dove Advanced Care is made with 24hour Renewing MicroMoisture. A ground-breaking new technology from Dove that deposits millions of tiny but powerfully moisturising droplets that, instead of getting washed off, absorb deeply and continuously work with your skin's natural renewal process to strengthen your skin's barrier and help retain and boost moisture, even after you shower. This moisturising body wash helps you turn every shower into an act of self-care, giving you 24hours of replenished, lotion-soft skin. This formula uses a blend of naturally-derived mild cleansers and skin natural nourishers to gently cleanse your skin and nourish your microbiome. It's also free from sulfate SLES, has 98%* biodegradable ingredients and is packaged in 100% recycled plastic bottles**. *98% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water & minerals (OECD test methods 301,302 and/or 310). **bottle excluding cap and labels This item has been successfully added to your list. x Skip to navigation Skip to content Skip to search Message Dialog Maximum basket size reached Out of stock placeholder... Availability is an indication only and is updated every 30 minutes. Find in store Product details Just as everyone's skin is different, skin dryness can appear differently for everyone. From mild, occasionally dry skin driven by ageing, weather fluctuations or just life! To dry patches and skin dryness, Dove has got you covered. Dove Advanced Care Deeply Nourishing body wash transforms even the driest skin in just one shower leaving it feeling lotion-soft skin for 24hrs. Unlike ordinary body washes, Dove Advanced Care is made with 24hour Renewing MicroMoisture. A ground-breaking new technology from Dove that deposits millions of tiny but powerfully moisturising droplets that, instead of getting washed off, absorb deeply and continuously work with your skin's natural renewal process to strengthen your skin's barrier and help retain and boost moisture, even after you shower. This moisturising body wash helps you turn every shower into an act of self-care, giving you 24hours of replenished, lotion-soft skin. This formula uses a blend of naturally-derived mild cleansers and skin natural nourishers to gently cleanse your skin and nourish your microbiome. It's also free from sulfate SLES, has 98%* biodegradable ingredients and is packaged in 100% recycled plastic bottles**. *98% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water & minerals (OECD test methods 301,302 and/or 310). **bottle excluding cap and labels Suitable for Suitable for all skin types How to use To get the most out of this moisturising body wash formula, reach for Dove Advanced Care Deeply Nourishing body wash when in the bath or shower and squeeze a generous amount into your palms. Massage the moisturizing body wash onto your skin, taking a moment to enjoy the rich lather before rinsing off to reveal lotion-soft skin. Hazards and Cautions Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. Contains Thermal Spring Water.Dermatologically Tested:Anthelios efficacy has been demonstrated via clinical studies carried out in-vivo on subjects suffering from sun intolerances, particularly those caused by UVA rays. Anthelios products all have a high PPD (Persistent Pigment Darkening) factor, offering one of the best protections against UVA offered by any brand in the world. The efficacy has been proven by a file of 16 clinical studies carried out by world-renowned expert dermatologists. The brand was also the first laboratory to use Mexoryl XL and Mexoryl SX and the first to use photostable UVA filters in its sun protection. 9/10 UK dermatologists would recommend Anthelios
